body: So "My Discussions" has the the number 8 next to it and it's saying that there's 8 replies to my posts. I click on it and there aren't any responses. Bug or what?
body_tagged: So "My Discussions" has the the number 8 next to it and it's saying that there's 8 replies to my posts. I click on it and there aren't any responses. Bug or what?
title: Weird forum bug.

replies.body: if you are on your poat and people replied during that, it will count as unread, repport at github
replies.body_tagged: if you are on your poat and people replied during that, it will count as unread, repport at github

replies.body: Click "Mark all Read" on the top in "My Discussions" to fix this.
replies.body_tagged: Click "Mark all Read" on the top in "My Discussions" to fix this.
